name: UNCERTAIN minigame
description:
In UNCERTAIN you play as a cuboid spirit that has lost its soul. You are a vessel for the soul that once was. In order to become whole again, you must traverse a dark museum, and search for the vibes to restore your soul. Use your mouse as a guiding light, and avoid the other spirits that want to end you, all while trying to collect the vibes necessary before it's too late.  

(This is a non-commercial game that was made as a student project.  There are no royalties to be gained by Dennel Cake, LLC., or  any of those involved in developing the UNCERTAIN minigame.)

For more of our games, visit www.dennelcake.com!
